title: Adjuvant Chemo Noninferor at 3 Months Vs 6 Months in Stage II/III CRC
desc: According to investigators of the phase 3 SCOT trial, most patients with colon and rectal cancer should be receiving only 3 months of adjuvant treatment.

title: Most mortgaged homeowners won’t see repayments increase if the RBA hikes interest rates this week
desc: Those who stuck to minimum loan repayments through last year’s rate cuts will bear the brunt of Tuesday’s anticipated hike, while those already paying extra are in a ‘great position’

title: Level Up Your Lake Life: Meet The Dock Ledge
desc: If you’ve ever spent a summer afternoon at a cottage on the water, you know the struggle: the lake is calling, but the bottom is a bit too “mucky,” or the water is just deep enough that treading water becomes a workout instead of a relaxation session. Enter The Dock Ledge, a game-changing, Ontario-made innovation […]

title: Red carpet looks at the Grammys: See which celebrities are best dressed
desc: The music industry’s red carpets are usually bolder, brighter and more adventurous than their Hollywood counterparts. And they don’t get bigger than the Grammys.

title: Why are school uniforms so expensive? And do we need them?
desc: With the start of term, families are grappling with familiar uniform dilemmas: how big to buy for fast-growing kids, why even a pair of socks need logos, and whether there’s any way to cut costs.

title: Five-year-old boy and father detained by ICE return home to Minnesota
